name: Escape From the Underworld (maisielaurence)
description:
Escape from the Underworld is a first-person action-adventure game. Fight your way out of the dungeon alive and triumph over the chains of the underworld.

As a poor, desperate soul sent from the ruins of a land desolated by decades of war over whose god must be worshipped; your remains are ferried to the darkest depths below, the Labyrinthus Subter.  Each level of Labyrinthus offers a terrifying new challenge and an ominous presence to cope with, and so you must scramble to find treasures long lost by those before you, scramble to find any kind of advantage against the horrors that await. Can Hades keep you imprisoned?

Credits-

Models and Coding-Tyler Buttler

UI-Cassidy Kaiser

Level Design and Coding-Maisie Laurence

Assets-Kenny Assets Castle Kit https://kenney.nl/assets/castle-kit

Kenny Assets Platformer Kit https://kenney.nl/assets/platformer-kit

Background Music-Peaceful Forest "Into Oblivion" by Darren Curtis
